overview.description: Complete redesign and rebuild of a legacy e-commerce platform serving 50,000+ monthly users. We modernized the tech stack, improved performance by 200%, and increased conversion rates by 35%.

techStack.name: TypeScript
techStack.reason: Type safety and better developer experience

techStack.name: Tailwind CSS
techStack.reason: Rapid UI development with utility-first CSS

techStack.name: PostgreSQL
techStack.reason: Reliable relational database for product data

timeline.description: Conducted user research, competitive analysis, and defined technical requirements.
Created high-fidelity designs, interactive prototypes, and design system.
Built frontend, backend, and integrated with payment systems and inventory management.
Deployed to production, monitored performance, and iteratively optimized based on user feedback.

testimonial.quote: The Elites transformed our outdated platform into a modern, lightning-fast e-commerce experience. Our sales have increased by 35% since launch, and customer satisfaction is at an all-time high.
testimonial.author: Sarah Johnson
testimonial.title: CEO, TechMart Inc.
